headline: BYD Moves To World Seventh Largest Country As Tesla Sales Slow
summary: BYD, the world’s largest EV maker, has begun expanding into Brazil, the world’s seventh-largest nation by population at 213 million people. That is just less than two-thirds of what America’s is. The BYD move is part of its effort to increase sales outside China, its home market. It also seeks to capitalize on Tesla’s (NASDAQ: ...
